channel.title: Dot on Leon Xiao's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Dot on Leon Xiao's Blog

item.title: A few word
item.description: Writing is your weakness since you re. You’re never good at expressing your idea. Make it useful.

item.title: Quarterly Review
item.description: Frankly speaking, you have set a bunch of target but actually you haven’t made any progress at all. Now you have to narrow down your objectives. Progress Wishlist

item.title: A brief Introduction to DOT language
item.description: Free from the Restrictions I have been quite obesssed with fancy tools and techniques. Before I met DOT, I have tried many tools to reorganize my thought. Such as Visio,Grapholite,SimpleMind, Xmind, MindNode, iMindMap barabara, such a long list. Each software has its own charming features as well as some minor restrictions. But what’s annoying most for a perfectionist is to finetune the layout and format. DOT actually gives you the oppotunity to free yourself from those trival matters, what you neeed to do is just focus on your own thinking and leave the rest to DOT.

item.title: New Year Plan 2018
item.description: Say hi,say bye! Say goodbye to yesterday low-efficiency and embrace a brand-new, productive lifestyle. Cliche as always. I don’t recall how much blogs I have created before.But I’m sure this blog will last as long as I’m able to write. Consider this article as the debut of ‘I do’ new episode, as well as the end of ‘Hello World’ storyline. Criteria Forget about yourself, don’t critize and judge your past.
